import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import data from "./alertData"; import PageTitle from "../../layouts/PageTitle"; import { Row, Card, Col, Alert, Button, Badge, Media } from "react-bootstrap"; const UiAlert = () => { const [socialMedia, setSocialMedia] = useState( Array.from(data.socialMediaData) ); const [leftIconBig, setLeftIconBig] = useState( Array.from(data.leftBigIconData) ); const [basicData, setBasicData] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [solidColor, setSolidColor] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [square] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [rounded] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [dismissable, setDismissable] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [alt, setAlt] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [solidAlt, setSolidAlt] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [dismissableWithSolid, setDismissableWithSolid] = useState( Array.from(data.mainData) ); const [withLink, setWithLink] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [withLinkAndSolidColor, setWithLinkAndSolidColor] = useState( Array.from(data.mainData) ); const [inlineNotifications] = useState( Array.from(data.mainData) ); const [iconLeft, setIconLeft] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [outline, setOutline] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [messageAlert, setMessageAlert] = useState(Array.from(data.mainData)); const [messageAlertWithSolidColor, setMessageAlertWithSolidColor] = useState( Array.from(data.mainData) ); const onClick = (index, setData, variables) => setData(variables.filter((data, i) => i !== index && data)); const btn = (i, dataset, data, height) => ( ); const alertDefferentMsg = () => data.variant === "info" ? "Hey! Take a quick look." : data.variant === "dark" || data.variant === "light" || data.variant === "danger" ? "Error! Something Went wrong" : data.variant === "warning" ? "Warning! Why you did it to me!" : "WOW! Eveything looks OK."; return ( Basic Alerts Bootstrap default style {basicData.map((data, i) => ( {data.emoji} {data.msg} {data.text} {btn(i, setBasicData, basicData, true)} ))} Solid color alerts add .solid class to change the solid color. {solidColor.map((data, i) => ( {data.msg} {data.text} {btn(i, setSolidColor, solidColor, true)} ))} Square alerts

add .alert-square class to change the solid color.

{square.map((data, i) => ( {data.msg} {data.text} ))} Rounded alerts

add .alert-rounded class to change the solid color.

{rounded.map((data, i) => ( {data.msg} {data.text} ))} Dismissable Alerts Bootstrap default style {dismissable.map((data, i) => ( {data.emoji} {data.msg} {data.text} {btn(i, setDismissable, dismissable, true)} ))} Alerts alt

add .alert-alt class to change the solid color.

{alt.map((data, i) => ( {data.emoji} {data.msg} {data.text} {btn(i, setAlt, alt, true)} ))} Solid Alt

add .alert-alt.solid class to change the solid color.

{solidAlt.map((data, i) => ( {data.emoji} {data.msg} {data.text} {btn(i, setSolidAlt, solidAlt, true)} ))} Dismissable with solid

add .solid class to change the solid color.

{dismissableWithSolid.map((data, i) => ( {data.emoji} {data.msg} {data.text} {btn(i, setDismissableWithSolid, dismissableWithSolid, true)} ))} Alert with Link

Bootstrap default style

"Click here for details." : data.variant === "warning" ? "Check this out" : "Please check this one as well"}{" "} {btn(i, setWithLink, withLink, true)} ))} Alert with Link and solid color

add .solid class to change the solid color.

{withLinkAndSolidColor.map((data, i) => ( {alertDefferentMsg(data)}{" "} upgrade {btn( i, setWithLinkAndSolidColor, withLinkAndSolidColor, true )} ))} Inline Notifications

))} Alert Icon Left

add .alert-right-icon to change the style

add .alert-outline-primary,secondary,success... to change the style

{outline.map((data, i) => ( {data.msg} {data.text} {btn(i, setOutline, outline, true)} ))} Alert Social

add{" "} .alert-social .facebook,.twitter,.linkedin,.google-plus {" "} to change the style
